title: Remember When: BlackHeart turned Team NZ fandom into accusations of treason
content:encoded:
How did a silly yacht race prompt rumours of sniper rifles and sports heroes being called traitors by grown adults? The ad exec behind the Goldstein ads got carried away and created a campaign which escalated into terrifying intensity and made international news in 2003.
